attributes.comment:
We are adopting from CCAI a child from China. Since the wait time has increased
and is predicted to exceed the 18 months that the I171H for is valid for; we will
have to refile that as well as the I600A form. We will have to pay the current fees
all over again and if the fee increases we will have to do that as well. We want to
give a loving home to a child that is otherwise unwanted and this increase in fees
makes a already difficult process even harder; not to mention a finincial strain.
Please help bring together our family by bringing home our daughter in the most
efficient and practical way.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Danyelle Leentjes
